Package game.characters.playable_characters

Class Player

java.lang.Object
edu.monash.fit2099.engine.actors.Actor
game.characters.playable_characters.Player
All Implemented Interfaces:
edu.monash.fit2099.engine.capabilities.Capable, edu.monash.fit2099.engine.displays.Printable, Resettable
public class Player extends edu.monash.fit2099.engine.actors.Actor implements Resettable
Class representing the Player. It implements the Resettable interface. It carries around a club to attack a hostile creature in the Lands Between. Created by:
Version:
1.0
Author:
Adrian Kristanto Modified by:, Bryan Wong, Po Han Tay

  • Constructor Details

    • Player

      public Player(String name, char displayChar, int hitPoints) throws Exception
      Player Constructor. Call Actor parent constructor to set the name, displayChar and hitpoints. Add the HOSTILE_TO_ENEMY status to allow this actor to enter the Floor.
      Parameters:
      name - : Name to call the player in the UI
      displayChar - : Character to represent the player in the UI
      hitPoints - : Player's starting number of hitpoints
      Throws:
      Exception - when failed to set data attributes of Player.

    • playTurn

      public edu.monash.fit2099.engine.actions.Action playTurn(edu.monash.fit2099.engine.actions.ActionList actions, edu.monash.fit2099.engine.actions.Action lastAction, edu.monash.fit2099.engine.positions.GameMap map, edu.monash.fit2099.engine.displays.Display display)
      At each turn, select a valid action the Player can perform by looping through ActionList. If there are no performable actions, do nothing.
      Specified by:
      playTurn in class edu.monash.fit2099.engine.actors.Actor
      Parameters:
      actions - : Collection of possible Actions for this Player.
      lastAction - : The Action this Player took last turn. Can do interesting things in conjunction with Action.getNextAction().
      map - : The map containing the Player.
      display - : The I/O object to which messages may be written.
      Returns:
      the valid action that can be performed in that iteration or null if no valid action is found.

    • allowableActions

      public edu.monash.fit2099.engine.actions.ActionList allowableActions(edu.monash.fit2099.engine.actors.Actor otherActor, String direction, edu.monash.fit2099.engine.positions.GameMap map)
      The Actor can attack the Player if they have the capability EnemyStatus.HOSTILE_TO_PLAYER.
      Overrides:
      allowableActions in class edu.monash.fit2099.engine.actors.Actor
      Parameters:
      otherActor - : The Actor that might be performing attack
      direction - : String representing the direction of the other Actor
      map - : current GameMap
      Returns:
      the list of allowable actions that can be performed by the other Actor to the Player.

    • reset

      public void reset(edu.monash.fit2099.engine.positions.GameMap map, edu.monash.fit2099.engine.positions.Location location)
      A method which will reset the Player hitpoints back to maximum whenever the Player rests or dies.
      Specified by:
      reset in interface Resettable
      Parameters:
      map - : The Game Map.
      location - : THe location of the Last Site of Lost Grace the Player rested at.
